from anthropic import Anthropic

client = Anthropic()

message = client.messages.create(
    model="claude-sonnet-4-20250514",
    max_tokens=4096,
    system="""I want you to act as a career coach. I will provide details about my professional background, skills...""",
    messages=[
        {"role": "user", "content": "Your message here"}
    ]
)
